rationale: The note does not document the patient's difficulty in adhering to the fluticasone/salmeterol regimen due to a busy schedule.
The note does not include the clinician's suggestion of setting reminders or linking medication intake to daily habits.
The note omits the patient's expressed concern about not wanting to experience another asthma exacerbation.
The note does not mention the clinician's plan to brainstorm additional strategies with the patient to improve medication adherence.
The note fails to document any assessment or plan regarding the patient's asthma management.
